references.paper_title: A Baseline for Detecting Misclassified and Out-of-Distribution Examples in Neural Networks
references.reason: This paper establishes a foundational baseline for out-of-distribution detection, providing a benchmark against which subsequent methods are compared.

references.paper_title: Deep Anomaly Detection with Outlier Exposure
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of outlier exposure, a significant advancement in OOD detection techniques, improving the robustness and accuracy of models.

references.paper_title: Partial and Asymmetric Contrastive Learning for Out-of-Distribution Detection in Long-Tailed Recognition
references.reason: This paper directly addresses the challenge of OOD detection in imbalanced datasets, which is a core focus of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Breaking Down Out-of-Distribution Detection: Many Methods Based on OOD Training Data Estimate a Combination of the Same Core Quantities
references.reason: This paper provides a deeper analysis of OOD detection methods, identifying common underlying principles and offering a unified perspective on existing techniques.

references.paper_title: Enhancing the Reliability of Out-of-Distribution Image Detection in Neural Networks
references.reason: This paper explores the reliability challenges in OOD detection and proposes methods to improve the robustness and consistency of model outputs.
